name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 Action-Packed Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 with this live wallpaper, featuring a clock and Google search bar for your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

Live Wallpaper: Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 action and graphics.
Built-in Clock: Seamless time display for easy reference.
Google Search Bar: Instant search access from your tab.
Optimized Performance: Lightweight design for smooth browsing.
Perfect for Fans: A must-have for Black Ops enthusiasts.
